channel.title: Black & White 2 on PRG-YouTube
channel.description: Recent content in Black & White 2 on PRG-YouTube

item.title: Land 9 - Aztec Homeland (Final Land) | Black & White 2
item.description: I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! If you want to play this game, make sure to install the latest Fan Patch (can be found here: https://forum.bwgame.net/threads/running-black-white-2-on-windows-10.7917/) Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/X3WZ9OI5_uU Tags on this video: ‘BW’, ‘PRG’, ‘GodGame’, ‘White’, ‘Classic’, ‘Game’, ‘God’, ‘Evil’, ‘Strategy’, ‘BW2’, ‘Black’, ‘Good’, ‘Gameplay’, ‘Video Game’, ‘Gaming’, ‘Tips’, ‘Efficient’, ‘Black & White 2’
